attributes.action: Make it an offence for non-disabled drivers to park in disabled bays at supermarkets, retail parks and other none local authority car parks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An excellent law in the United States prohibits the use of disabled bays by non-disabled drivers, at privately owned establishments. Such a law would I believe help to stop those ignorant individuals who choose to use these facilities, when they are not entitled.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
